{
  "document_0": {
    "tribal_dominance": [
      "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
      "Anytime you have to rely upon your enemy for a job, you're in bad shape. When you — and he is your enemy. You wouldn't be in this country if some enemy hadn't kidnapped you and brought you here."
    ],
    "individual_dignity": [
      "We have injected ourselves into the civil rights struggle. And we intend to expand it from the level of civil rights to the level of human rights."
    ],
    "fear": [
      "frustrations in the black community that makes the black community throughout America today more explosive than all of the atomic bombs the Russians can ever invent.",
      "When a racial powder keg goes off, it doesn't care who it knocks out the way. Understand this, it's dangerous."
    ],
    "hope": [
      "it will take black nationalism to bring about the freedom of 22 million Afro-Americans, here in this country",
      "And the best place to start is right in the community where we live."
    ],

      "The Man is becoming richer and richer, and you're becoming poorer and poorer.",

    ],

      "Adam Clayton Powell, is a Christian minister...he's more famous for his political struggling. And Dr. King is a Christian minister...he's become more famous for being involved in the civil rights struggle.",
      "black, brown, red and yellow people in Africa and Asia are getting their independence."
    ],
    "enmity": [
      "Mr. Moderator, Rev. Cleage, brothers and sisters and friends, and I see some enemies.",

    ],

      "But if we keep our religion at home...but when we come out here we have a fight that's common to all of us against a enemy who is common to all of us.",
      "the only way we're going to solve it: we got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony. And black nationalism is the key."

      "Today it's time to stop singing and start swinging."
    ],
    "cohesive_goals": [
      "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",

  "document_1": {
    "tribal_dominance": [
      "Anyone who lives inside the United States can never be considered an outsider anywhere within its bounds.",
      "It gives the segregator a false sense of superiority and the segregated a false sense of inferiority."
    ],
    "individual_dignity": [
      "Any law that uplifts human personality is just. Any law that degrades human personality is unjust.",
      "all men will respect the dignity and worth of human personality."
    ],
    "fear": [
      "when you have seen vicious mobs lynch your mothers and fathers at will and drown your sisters and brothers at whim; when you have seen hate filled policemen curse, kick and even kill your black brothers and sisters",
      "a frightening racial nightmare"
    ],
